PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: According to the equation E LUMO = E HOMO + E g,opt , the LUMO energy level of PSFDTBT was calculated to be -3.43 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| E LUMO |
| E HOMO |
| E g,opt |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| E LUMO |
| E HOMO |

These two entities are the LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) energy level and the HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) energy level, which are both material properties used to describe the electronic structure of a material.
